article.il: The United States has never won an Olympic water polo title, but members of the Los Angeles Athletic Club team are shortly to make a tour of Europe, during which they will meet outstanding aggregations from all countries. Thus the players will get the fine points of the sport from international experts, and perhaps increase America's chances for a title in the 1932 games

article.il: Mr. J. M. Ranking who will steer the Cambridge boat to-day against Oxford in the annual University boat race on the Thames. He weighs 6st. 13lbs. and is the lightest coxswain to appear in either crew for 23 years

article.il: Miss Mabel Greenslade at the Overseas Telephone switchboard. She put through the first public Australian call last summer
